column2: I was particularly impressed with how Uchi has been able to adapt to a socially-distanced
column3: safe dining experience without it feeling sterile or uncomfortable. The front desk did an incredible job of communicating with us in advance of our reservation to explain the protocol for arrival. There are undoubtedly less tables in the dining room than there were pre-COVID
column4: but it doesn't feel empty or odd inside. It's a warm
column5: intimate dining experience without the anxiety of dining too close to strangers.
